resume.pendingTooltip: Click to resume previous Claude session

worktree.createDescription: Create an isolated workspace for this terminal.
worktree.name: Worktree Name
worktree.nameInvalid: Name must start and end with a letter or number
worktree.nameHelp: Lowercase letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores (spaces become hyphens)
worktree.baseBranchHelp: The branch to create the worktree from
worktree.alreadyExists: A worktree with this name already exists
worktree.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete the worktree and its branch. Any uncommitted changes will be lost.

empty.title: No terminal sessions
empty.description: Open a new terminal to get started
